This is our R Markdown document for our data on life expectancy. Follow this document to reproduce our work in R. To fork our work our find our source files find us on GitHub <https://github.com/agcarranza/DV_RProject2>.

Our data consisted of 4656 observations on life expectancy in different countries based on sex, income group, region, age, and year.
